title: Ex-Miners Are STILL Living in La-La Land
description:
SPONSORS: Learn more about the NZXT H7! https://nzxt.co/GregH7

Let's look at some ex-miner rigs and the ridiculous valuations they're giving their graphics cards. In case you've been off the grid, graphics card prices have plummeted recently. Miners who likely bought during the peak are still looking for top dollar... but don't be fooled! Don't choose to live in la-la land! :-D

‚≠ê Consider supporting us on Patreon! https://www.patreon.com/gregsalazar

SPONSOR: Snag an OEM Windows 10 Pro key for $16 using code 'SKGS' for a 25% discount:https://bit.ly/Win10SKGS
Win10 Home ($15):https://bit.ly/homeSKGS
Office 2019 ($48): https://bit.ly/2019SKGS

DISCLOSURES: All Genius links are tied to our Amazon Associate account, from which we earn a small sales commission. Links containing a 'bit.ly' reference forwarding to Newegg are tied to our Rakuten account, from which we earn a small sales commission. All sponsored links and comments will contain the word "SPONSOR" or "AD." Any additional revenue stream will be disclosed with similar verbiage.
